item.title: Obama’s Utterly Incoherent Syria Strategy
item.description: Obama pitched war to a war-weary America, and all he got back was a yawn. Tonight’s speech was touted as the most important of his life. I doubt many will remember in 3 years. “I have asked Congress to find something else to do for a couple of weeks,” seemed to be the theme. Or “there’s something wrong with you people for wanting to bomb a Middle East country. I mean, they’re Muslims for God’s sake.
